mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ohio Room, Mount Vernon Mansion.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Mount Vernon Ladies' Association of the Union
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the fireplace mantel in the little parlor. Mounted on orange board. Text printed directly onto the reverse of the card reads: Ohio Room, Mount Vernon Mansion. Nellie Custis' Music Room. Copyright by the Mount Vernon Ladies' Union Association. Luke C. Dillon, Authorized Photographer, Office at Pullman's Gallery, 935 Penna. Avenue, Washington City, D. C.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Little Parlor
